name: Kim
review: I use Cafe Buzzer's Coffee Beans for my espresso.Beans were Really fresh and dry well.Sipping in the cup of Espresso is the best way to reminds of the Nuclear as both of them are small in amount but tremendous in Energy,my haircut inspired by shape of espresso cup

name: Isaac Neuton
review: I hate Apple,it ruined my Latte on that day.However,latte is good. When I sip that first time, i feel something in my stomach, from that day i was thinking about Gravity.I use Cafe Buzzer's Coffee Bean  for my latte.Beans were Super Qualityfull

name: Mahfuj Alam
review: I brought Cafe Buzzer's Coffee Bean for Affogato.Beans were Really fresh and dry well.My Heart Beeped on and become 'Hahakar' when I take a sip of Affogato for the first time .Then I start to make my great song.Affgato is really interesting coffee brew.

name: Monalisa
review: I never brought Cafe Buzzer's Coffee Bean,I think these will be good as per other customer reviews .If  I had life , I will definitely try there bean sometime.It's good to see Mocha all the time,I love it but can't afford to get it,Chocolate Mocha and me be like long distance relationship

name: Rabindranath
review: If Anupam knew the taste of Flat White of your coffee beans,surely he could learn how to flirt with kallani,My Bad!I just take a shot of Flat white then thinking that if I have a shaving cream on that time

name: Xavier
review: A coffee is a coffee,if that coffee become coffee than it is more than a coffee
